deep_breathing.name: 4-7-8 Breathing Technique
deep_breathing.description: Breathe in for 4 seconds, hold for 7 seconds, exhale for 8 seconds

grounding_5_4_3_2_1.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding Technique
grounding_5_4_3_2_1.description: Name 5 things you see, 4 you can touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste

progressive_muscle_relaxation.name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
progressive_muscle_relaxation.description: Tense and relax each muscle group from toes to head

box_breathing.name: Box Breathing
box_breathing.description: Breathe in 4, hold 4, out 4, hold 4. Repeat.

thought_challenging.name: Cognitive Reframing
thought_challenging.description: Question anxious thoughts: Is this thought realistic? What evidence do I have?

worry_time.name: Scheduled Worry Time
worry_time.description: Set aside 15 minutes daily to worry, postpone worries to this time

behavioral_activation.name: Activity Scheduling
behavioral_activation.description: Plan and engage in pleasurable or meaningful activities daily

social_connection.name: Social Engagement
social_connection.description: Reach out to friends, family, or support groups

self_compassion.name: Self-Compassion Practice
self_compassion.description: Treat yourself with kindness, as you would a good friend

time_management.name: Prioritization and Planning
time_management.description: Break tasks into smaller steps, prioritize, take breaks

physical_activity.name: Regular Exercise
physical_activity.description: 30 minutes of moderate activity most days

mindfulness_meditation.name: Mindfulness Practice
mindfulness_meditation.description: 10-20 minutes daily of focused attention on breath or body

sleep_hygiene.consistent_schedule: Go to bed and wake up at the same time daily
sleep_hygiene.bedroom_environment: Keep room dark, quiet, and cool (60-67Â°F)
sleep_hygiene.relaxation_routine: Develop calming pre-bed routine (reading, bath, stretching)

lifestyle_practices.nutrition: Eat regular, balanced meals with adequate protein and vegetables
lifestyle_practices.limit_alcohol: Alcohol can worsen mood and anxiety
